title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4300.18 - Altering cashed pari-mutuel tickets and cashed vouchers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4300.18 - Altering cashed pari-mutuel tickets and cashed vouchers

State Regulations

An authorized pari-mutuel wagering entity shall ensure
that each cashed or refunded mutuel ticket and cashed voucher is branded or
marked in a manner that indicates the mutuel ticket or voucher has been cashed
or refunded, but does not destroy the identity of the ticket or
voucher. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4300.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
